Sql.query: select EQUINOMB as Empresa, BARRBARRATRANSFERENCIA as Barra, EMPRNOMB as Cliente, CODENTCODIGO as Codigo from Transferencia.TRN_PERIODO P, Transferencia.TRN_CODIGO_ENTREGA C, Transferencia.VW_EQ_CENTRAL_GENERACION G, Transferencia.TRN_BARRA B, Transferencia.VW_SI_EMPRESA E where C.EQUICODI = G.EQUICODI and C.BARRCODI = B.BARRCODI and C.EMPRCODI = E.EMPRCODI and P.PERICODI = :PERICODI and P.PERIANIOMES between extract(year from C.CODENTFECHAINICIO) * 100 + extract(month from C.CODENTFECHAINICIO) and extract(year from C.CODENTFECHAFIN) * 100 + extract(month from C.CODENTFECHAFIN) and not exists (select CODENTCODI from Transferencia.TRN_TRANS_ENTREGA T where C.CODENTCODI = T.CODENTCODI) UNION select E.EMPRNOMB as Empresa, BARRBARRATRANSFERENCIA as Barra, CL.EMPRNOMB as Cliente, TRETCODIGO as Codigo from Transferencia.TRN_PERIODO P, Transferencia.VW_TRN_CODIGO_RETIRO C, Transferencia.VW_SI_EMPRESA E, Transferencia.TRN_BARRA B, Transferencia.VW_SI_EMPRESA CL where C.GENEMPRCODI = E.EMPRCODI and C.BARRCODI = B.BARRCODI and C.CLIEMPRCODI = CL.EMPRCODI and P.PERICODI = :PERICODI and P.PERIANIOMES between extract(year from C.FECHAINICIO) * 100 + extract(month from C.FECHAINICIO) and extract(year from C.FECHAFIN) * 100 + extract(month from C.FECHAFIN) and not exists (select TRETTABLA, TRETCORESOCORESCCODI from Transferencia.TRN_TRANS_RETIRO T where C.TRETTABLA = T.TRETTABLA and C.TRETCORESOCORESCCODI = T.TRETCORESOCORESCCODI)
